<script>
  if (typeof Popper === "undefined") {
    Popper = {
      createPopper: () => {
        destroy: () => null;
      },
    };
  }
  if (typeof Mark === "undefined")
    Mark = {
      unmark: () => null,
      mark: () => null,
    };
</script>

    <main>
      <section>
  <div class='section'>
    # <i class="fas fa-microscope"></i>Research

</div></section><section><div class='section'>

## Card Search

A _card search_ component, a search box to find all _card_ components on the page that contain certain words/names.

You can type in "terms" (single words) or "phrases" (quoted multiple words), like `term1 term2 "full phrase 1" "full phrase 2"`.
Cards that contain all of the terms and at least one of the phrases will be considered a match.
Search words will be highlighted in the results (if they're longer than 2 characters).
Searching is case insensitive.

<div class="card_search">
  <div class="card_search_box">
    <input class="card_search_input" />
    <i class="fas fa-search"></i>
  </div>
  <div class="card_search_info">
    Showing <span class="card_search_count">all</span> papers
  </div>
</div>


</div></section><section><div class='section'>

## Research List

A _research list_ component, to sort and group all of your research publications.
Can be used on any page, but assumes its content from `/_data/research-output.yml`.
Uses the _card_ component (small).

<!-- ...Paper Sorting... -->



<!-- ...Paper Sorting Ended... -->

<div class="card" data-size="small">
  
  <a
    href="https://aclanthology.org/2025.findings-acl.978/"
    class="card_image"
  ><img
      src="/images/publications/ChartQAPro.png"
      onerror="this.src = '/images/placeholder.svg'; this.onerror = null;"
    ></a>
  <div class="card_text">
    
    <a href="https://aclanthology.org/2025.findings-acl.978/" class="card_title">ChartQAPro: A More Diverse and Challenging Benchmark for Chart Question Answering</a>
    <p
      
      class="truncate"
      tabindex="0"
      
    >Ahmed Masry, Mohammed Saidul Islam, Mahir Ahmed, Aayush Bajaj, Firoz Kabir, Aaryaman Kartha, Md Tahmid Rahman Laskar, Mizanur Rahman, Shadikur Rahman, Mehrad Shahmohammadi, Megh Thakkar, Md Rizwan Parvez, Enamul Hoque, Shafiq Joty
</p><p
      
      class="truncate"
      tabindex="0"
      
    >ACL 2025 (Findings)  ·  
<!-- Full Date -->
<!--01 Jan 2025-->
<!-- Month and Year only -->
<!--Jan 2025-->

<!-- Year Only -->
2025
</p><div>
    
    
      <a href="https://github.com/vis-nlp/ChartQAPro" class="paper_link"><i class="fas fa-code"></i>Source</a>

<div class="card" data-size="small">
  
  <a
    href="https://dl.acm.org/doi/abs/10.1145/3581641.3584099"
    class="card_image"
  ><img
      src="/images/publications/seechart.png"
      onerror="this.src = '/images/placeholder.svg'; this.onerror = null;"
    ></a>
  <div class="card_text">
    
    <a href="https://dl.acm.org/doi/abs/10.1145/3581641.3584099" class="card_title">SeeChart: Enabling Accessible Visualizations Through Interactive Natural Language Interface For People with Visual Impairments</a>
    <p
      
      class="truncate"
      tabindex="0"
      
    >Md Zubair Ibne Alam, Shehnaz Islam, Enamul Hoque
</p><p
      
      class="truncate"
      tabindex="0"
      
    >IUI 2023  ·  
<!-- Full Date -->
<!--01 Jan 2023-->
<!-- Month and Year only -->
<!--Jan 2023-->

<!-- Year Only -->
2023
</p><div>
    
      <a href="https://dl.acm.org/doi/abs/10.1145/3581641.3584099" class="paper_link"><i class="fas fa-file-pdf"></i>PDF</a>

      
    
    
    
      <a href="https://www.yorku.ca/enamulh/video/iui23a-sub1109-i8.mp4" class="paper_link"><i class="fas fa-play-circle"></i>Video</a>

      
    
    </div>
</div>
</div>

<div class="card" data-size="small">
  
  <a
    href="https://dl.acm.org/doi/10.1145/3334480.3382964"
    class="card_image"
  ><img
      src="/images/publications/com-pulse.png"
      onerror="this.src = '/images/placeholder.svg'; this.onerror = null;"
    ></a>
  <div class="card_text">
    
    <a href="https://dl.acm.org/doi/10.1145/3334480.3382964" class="card_title">Towards Understanding Desiderata for Large-Scale Civic Input Analysis</a>
    <p
      
      class="truncate"
      tabindex="0"
      
    >Mahmood Jasim, Enamul Hoque, Ali Sarvghad, Narges Mahyar
</p><p
      
      class="truncate"
      tabindex="0"
      
    >In	Proceedings	of The ACM Conference on Human	Factors	in Computing	Systems	(CHI)  ·  
<!-- Full Date -->
<!--01 Oct 2020-->
<!-- Month and Year only -->
<!--Oct 2020-->

<!-- Year Only -->
2020
</p><div>
    
      <a href="https://dl.acm.org/doi/pdf/10.1145/3334480.3382964" class="paper_link"><i class="fas fa-file-pdf"></i>PDF</a>

      
    
    
    
    </div>
</div>
</div>






<!-- ...Extra Links... -->

<!-- ...Extra Links Ended... -->
